what.title: hii ni nini?
what.body1: Swali nzuri. Eehâ€¦ Hapa ni pahali pa kuhukumu kujitokeza hatia ya ndege bure!
what.body2: Vipi hivyo? Ni hivi onaâ€¦ Vile tunavyojua ndege wako hatarini na kuwinda kwa ajili ya biashara ya wanyamapori kinyume na sheria, Lakini si kwa uhakika kiasi gani baadhi ya ndege wako hatarini zaidi kuliko wengine na kwa nini? Ni nini hufanya ndege kuvutia? Kati ya jibu bila shaka ni mvuto wa ndege. Lakini ni nini hicho kinamfanya ndege avutie?
what.body3: Ni vigumu kusema sio? Na vigumu kabisa kueka kipimo! Hapo sasa ndipo tunapokuhitaji. Ni wakati wa kuangalia ndege na kutoa fikra zako baina ğŸ˜¨ ya ğŸ˜. Njoo, wajua wataka kufanya hivyo. Na ni kwa nia nzuri!
what.body5: To carry out this scientific study we use a limited amount of your information in addition to the ratings you make. These data include a randomly generated identifier (which we use to consolidate your ratings if you visit the app on separate occasions) and the language you have chosen to use. We store these data along with your ratings. Where applicable these data are covered by
what.body6: the privacy policy of the Finnish Biodiversity Information Facility
what.body7: . If you are not comfortable with sharing this information with us then you should not proceed to the next page. If you would like to continue then click the arrow below.

about.title: iratebirds
about.body1: Imebuniwa na Biodiversity Informatics Unit pamoja na Helsinki Lab of Ornithology kule kwa Finnish Museum of Natural History - LUOMUS, University of Helsinki.
about.body3: Picha kutoka kwa Macualay Library, Cornell Lab of Ornithology.
about.survey_request: Bonyeza hapa kujihusisha na utafiti huu kwa hiari yako

q1.question: 1. Unamaanisha nini ukisema kuvutiwa na uzuri?
q1.answer: Tunakuwa wazi na hii. Ni juu yako uamue ni nini hufanya ndege awe wa kuvutia kwa uzuri. Bali kwa kuamua hilo zingatia namna ndege anakaa. Kama una hisia zingine kuhusu ndege kadhaa ambazo si namna anakaa, ziwe nzuri ama mbaya, zieke kando, na umakinike na muonekano wa ndege.

q2.question: 2. Natathmini nini haswa, picha, ndege, ama aina ya ndege?
q2.answer: Tunataka kujua kile unachofikiria kuhusu huyu ndege( ama hawa ndege ikiwa picha ina ndege zaidi ya mmoja). Kweli, wakati mwengine picha inaweza fanya ndege aonekane vizuri au vibaya kuliko alivyo. Usibabaike na hilo, wewe tathmini unayoiona mbele yako. Na ukiwa unajua kuwa aina ya ndege fulani ni wazuri tayari kuliko wale wa picha jaribu kusahau hiyo kwa huo muda.

q3.question: 3. Nachukua muda gani kutathmini hawa ndege?
q3.answer: Usifikire sana. Tunataka ukweli wako wa hakika. Tathmini ndege mara moja kisha uende kwa mwengine baada ya kuacha kupendezwa kuangalia.

q4.question: 4. Niko na upendeleo fulani wa ndege. Hio haitadhuru uchambuzi wangu?
q4.answer: Tunataka kujua akipendacho mtu kwa ndege. Sisi sote tuko tofauti na tunapenda vitu vingi. Kama vile ndege!

survey.request: Kutusaidia tuweze kuelewa uvutaji wa ndege tafadhali kubali uchambuzi huu wa huru wa mtumiaji
